# odee

> AI-powered scene partner and audition tracker for professional actors

Odee helps actors rehearse scripts with lifelike AI voices, manage auditions, and track their progress. Upload scripts, practice scenes line-by-line, and stay organized throughout your audition process.

## Core Features

- **AI Scene Partner**: Practice with realistic AI-generated voices that respond to your cues
- **Script Management**: Automatic parsing and character identification from uploaded scripts
- **Line Practice**: Fine-tune delivery of individual lines with customizable tone and direction
- **Audition Tracking**: Organize auditions, materials, and preparation status
- **Voice Selection**: Choose from multiple AI voices to match your scene partners

## Pages

- [Home](https://odee.io/): Platform overview and getting started
- [Dashboard](https://odee.io/tracker): Main rehearsal and audition management interface
- [Sign In](https://odee.io/signin): Access your account
- [Join Waitlist](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe9THykmDJkTY1C2E7sdofD58M3UGKhKHKQQ_gUsoyPBM1jsQ/viewform): Request early access

## Use Cases

**Script Rehearsal**: Actors upload scripts and practice scenes with AI scene partners available 24/7

**Audition Preparation**: Rehearse specific scenes multiple times to perfect timing and delivery

**Line Delivery Refinement**: Practice individual lines with different emphasis and emotion

**Self-Tape Practice**: Run through scenes before recording audition tapes

**Audition Organization**: Track audition progress and stay organized

## Target Audience

Professional actors, theater performers, acting students, and anyone preparing for auditions or performances who needs a reliable rehearsal/scene partner.

## Technical Details

- **Platform**: Web-based application (Next.js, TypeScript, React, Firebase)
- **Availability**: Free trial available
- **Operating System**: Web (cross-platform compatible)

## Contact

- **Email**: hello@odee.io
- **Website**: https://odee.io
